alert.note: Alert for Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Warning issued March 31 at 2:28PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a Fire Warning at the request of Oklahoma Forestry Services for Oklahoma County. * AT 224 PM CDT, a dangerous wildfire was located over northern Oklahoma City, moving rapidly east at 3 to 5 mph. * Areas impacted... northern Oklahoma City in the vicinity of north Bryant and Hefner just south of the Kilpatrick Turnpike. * Additional Information...This is a dangerous fire. Smoke and wildfire present a threat to life and property in north Oklahoma City. $$ TL
info.instruction: Be prepared to evacuate quickly if requested and follow all safety instructions from local emergency management officials. Do not drive into smoke. Firefighters and incident responders should anticipate extreme fire behavior including a wind-driven and torching fire.
